description: '''James Nicholas Righton''' (born 25 August 1983) is an English musician. As well as singing, he was the keyboard-player of the London-based [[new rave]] band [[Klaxons]], which disbanded in 2015. In March 2016, Righton announced his new project Shock Machine with a video directed by [[Saam Farahmand]]. Righton released his first solo album ''[[The Performer (James Righton album)|The Performer]]'' on Soulwax's [[Deewee]] label in March 2020.
